name: Crushed Red Pepper Flakes
properties: Alternative to jalapeño peppers or red pepper powder
Easy to add to any meal
benefits: Crushed red pepper flakes activate brown adipose tissue (BAT) for increased calorie burning and metabolism. Half a teaspoon daily provides thermogenic effects. The capsaicin content helps with fat burning and appetite suppression.

quotes: Alternately, for BAT activation, you can add one raw jalapeño pepper or ½ teaspoon of red pepper powder (or, presumably, crushed red pepper flakes) into your daily diet.
